sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams, Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async'; const SetupStatus: React.FC = () => { const { packageName } = useParams<{ packageName: string }>(); const [paymentData, setPaymentData] = useState(null); const packageInfo: Record = { 'checkout': { name: 'Stripe Checkout Setup', price: '€299' }, 'subscriptions': { name: 'Subscriptions Setup', price: '€749' }, 'crm': { name: 'CRM Integration', price: '€1,499' }, 'marketplace': { name: 'Marketplace Setup', price: '€1,999' } }; const currentPackage = packageInfo[packageName || 'checkout'] || packageInfo['checkout']; useEffect(() => { // Get payment data from sessionStorage const stored = sessionStorage.getItem('setupPaymentData'); if (stored) { setPaymentData(JSON.parse(stored)); } }, []); if (!paymentData) { return (

Loading...

); } return (
Setup Status - {currentPackage.name} | Fynteq
{/* Success Header */}

Payment Confirmed

Your setup request has been received

{/* Status Card */}

Setup Status

{/* Status Timeline */}

Payment Completed

Your payment has been successfully processed

{new Date(paymentData.paymentDate).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric', hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' })}

Setup in Progress

Our team is preparing your integration

Setup Complete

We'll notify you when your setup is ready

{/* Important Notice */}

What Happens Next?

Our team will begin working on your {currentPackage.name} setup. We'll contact you within 2-7 business days to:

  • Review your requirements and technical details
  • Set up and configure your payment integration
  • Perform testing and quality assurance
  • Provide documentation and handover

We'll reach out to you via {paymentData.preferredContactMethod === 'email' ? 'email' : paymentData.preferredContactMethod} at {paymentData.email}

{/* Order Details */}

Order Details

Service {currentPackage.name}
Company {paymentData.company}
Contact {paymentData.email}
Amount Paid {currentPackage.price}
Order Date {new Date(paymentData.paymentDate).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' })}
{/* Actions */}
Back to Setup Return to Home
{/* Support */}

Need help or have questions?

Contact Support
); }; export default SetupStatus;
